医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究表明西兰花芽可以缓解青少年克罗恩病症状西兰花芽的影响及其在解决克罗恩病症状中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/New-research-reveals-broccoli-sprouts-may-alleviate-Crohns-disease-symptoms-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/New-research-reveals-broccoli-sprouts-may-alleviate-Crohns-disease-symptoms-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4d69b80-dabf-41a4-a415-29de757e3059 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 04:59:00 -0500 New research reveals broccoli sprouts may alleviate Crohn's disease symptoms in youth
神经回路对快速多巴胺激增做出反应研究人员评估了多巴胺信号传导、大脑连接/活动以及自我记录的哌醋甲酯暴露后的“高”药效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Neural- Circuits-respond-to-rapid-dopamine-surges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Neural- Circuits-respond-to-rapid-dopamine-surges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3f8316d-7042-47bf-95d0-efdcffd65114 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 03:43:00 -0500 Neural circuits respond to rapid dopamine surges
研究表明父母压力与儿童哮喘症状加剧之间存在联系昆士兰大学的研究表明，父母因经济困难而产生的压力与儿童哮喘症状加剧之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-shows-link- Between-parental-stress-and-exacerbated-asthma-symptoms-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-shows-link- Between-parental-stress-and-exacerbated-asthma-symptoms-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=183bec31-20eb-4ee0-a24d-724c4a816bad Mon, 13 Nov 2023 22:57:11 -0500 Study shows link between parental stress and exacerbated asthma symptoms in children
新研究确定了影响 32 种癌症类型进展的 4,749 个关键基因簇西奈山转化疾病模型中心的研究人员发布了一项开创性的研究，确定了 4,749 个关键基因簇（称为“预后模块”），它们显着影响 32 种不同类型癌症的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-study-identizes-4749-key-gene-clusters-that-influence-progression-of-32-cancer-types.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-study-identizes-4749-key-gene-clusters-that-influence-progression-of-32-cancer-types.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56453a15-4de1-4d1c-ba33-9d088a4868fa Mon, 13 Nov 2023 22:45:53 -0500 New study identifies 4,749 key gene clusters that influence progression of 32 cancer types
新型凝胶输送系统克服了瘤内癌症免疫治疗的挑战肿瘤内治疗（将癌症药物直接注射到肿瘤中）是实体癌的一种有前途的治疗选择，但由于无法精确输送药物，而且大多数免疫疗法很快从注射部位消散，因此在临床试验中取得的成功有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-gel-delivery-system-overcomes-challenges-of-intratumoral-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/New-gel-delivery-system-overcomes-challenges-of-intratumoral-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5810a8fa-d709-4b9e-959c-02e59e5e5437 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 22:40:58 -0500 New gel delivery system overcomes challenges of intratumoral cancer immunotherapy
研究发现针灸对慢性自发性荨麻疹的缓解作用有限一项随机对照试验纳入了超过 300 名被诊断患有慢性自发性荨麻疹 (CSU) 或荨麻疹的患者，结果发现针灸可能只能有限地缓解病情，但这一发现的临床意义尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Acupuncture-may-offer-limited-relief-from-chronic-spontaneous-urticaria-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Acupuncture-may-offer-limited-relief-from-chronic-spontaneous-urticaria-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71110244-e163-4b2c-9a19-b43a6a775abd Mon, 13 Nov 2023 22:36:42 -0500 Acupuncture may offer limited relief from chronic spontaneous urticaria, study finds
探索大自然的调色板：天然食品着色剂的光明未来《食品》杂志上的一篇评论讨论了天然食品作为食品中合成着色剂替代品的潜力，重点关注其安全性和潜在的健康益处。它强调需要进行更多研究以提高天然食品着色剂的稳定性和可用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Exploring-natures-palette-The-promising-future-of-natural-food-colorants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Exploring-natures-palette-The-promising-future-of-natural-food-colorants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=760eaff0-b31a-4680-9474-b5b34670b133 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:53:00 -0500 Exploring nature's palette: The promising future of natural food colorants
自恋会影响我们的身体形象和饮食选择吗？研究评估了自恋与身体形象问题之间的关系，揭示了自恋特征如何影响对瘦身和肌肉的渴望以及相关的饮食行为，并且不同性别之间存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Does-narcissism-drive-our-body-image-and-dietary-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Does-narcissism-drive-our-body-image-and-dietary-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3293a3a-f319-4def-b125-cc24d7bfba39 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:39:00 -0500 Does narcissism drive our body image and dietary choices?
研究观察到 20% 接受尼尔马韦-利托那韦治疗的 COVID-19 患者出现病毒学反弹一项对多中心医疗保健系统中接受急性 COVID-19 治疗的患者进行的观察性研究发现，接受尼马曲韦-利托那韦 (NR) 治疗的患者中约有 20% 出现病毒学反弹，而未接受治疗的患者中这一比例约为 2%。研究结果发表在《内科医学年鉴》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-observes-virologic-rebound-in-2025-of-COVID-19-病人-treatment-with-nirmatrelvir-ritonavir.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-observes-virologic-rebound-in-2025-of-COVID-19-病人-treatment-with-nirmatrelvir-ritonavir.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7365c668-0ef2-47df-b84f-0b51895cf2e4 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:29:35 -0500 Study observes virologic rebound in 20% of COVID-19 patients treated with nirmatrelvir-ritonavir
研究表明环境在健康老龄化和疾病预防中发挥着关键作用研究探索了新的老年科学工具来研究环境因素对衰老的影响，旨在延缓与年龄相关的疾病和残疾。它强调了环境毒素和社会经济条件等非遗传因素如何显着影响衰老和健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-shows-environments-pivotal-role-in-healthy-aging-and-disease-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-shows-environments-pivotal-role-in-healthy-aging-and-disease-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a1b77bd-2f29-4840-9a81-462f2d0d2f32 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 21:24:00 -0500 Study shows environment's pivotal role in healthy aging and disease prevention
